summary: Changes the standard gold piece to a copper coin, and adds silver, gold, and platinum coins that appear just about anywhere you\'d normally find coins!
descriptionHtml:
This simple little mod adds 3 more valuable coins to the leveled lists and will appear alongside regular coins! The new coins are classified as \"vendoritemingots\" so you can exchange them anywhere you can sell ingots! 

-Copper Coins are the standard coin replacement, and now weigh .001 each
-Silver Coins are now valued at 35 and weigh .01 each
-Golden Coins are now valued at 80 and weigh .1 each
-NEW Platinum Coins are valued at 150 and weigh 1 each

They can all be found at any level with scaling rarity based on the players level :)

I strongly recommend using WryeBash to merge leveled lists! :)
This mod is compatible with thedamned\'s Skyrim Coin Replacer (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8611), load his mod after mine for proper replacement of \'dumacs\' and \'haralds\' on the leveled lists!

This mod uses edited textures from the Teutonic Coin replacer by LieutenantHawk, found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5260

Also check out my other mods!
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10184 Soft Leather Armor
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9784 Less Frustrating Hard Mode
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10249 Convertible Archmage Robes
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10899 Armor Padding Kits 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11538 Falkreath Cabin

Credits:
Bethesda
TheNexus
LieutenantHawk for permission to use his Teutonic coin texture: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5260
author: crazyjoe2k - LieutenantHawk
